title: Unfair Ban
body:
I feel I received an unfair ban for this situation. I was in a premade with friends, just having fun, doing our thing, when one of us started joking around. The game was fine, no toxicity between the two teams, when after I receive an immediate ban for 2 weeks without warning for the evidence below, that doesn't even differentiate between all and in team chat. I have never been banned before, never received warning that I was toxic, no chat bans, I'm always one of the most honorable players on my team with 2+ honors every game, and a dedicated player. I'd like to know why I got a 2 week ban without warning for a 1 game offense against a premade when I have no prior behavior of being toxic nor received any warning that perhaps my trolling might have been going overboard. I've been playing the game for years, reached honor level 5 far sooner than other players last season, and have never received warnings, or a chat ban in my life. I'm a dedicated player and was a believer in the tribunal, but when proof of toxic players were not getting banned, and I receiving this unfair one, makes me want to quit. It's absolutely ridiculous. I've spent so much time and money on riot only for this to happen out of the blue.
